Class Piece

java.lang.Object
logic.Piece
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object implements Serializable
Egy általános bábu.
Author:
Skáre Erik

      public boolean canTakeEnPassant()
